description: The 2024 Little League World Series is on. Find out how and when to watch, even if you don't have cable.
title: How to watch the Little League World Series today

description: Secretary of State Antony Blinken took questions from the press pool at a Doha, Qatar, plane tarmac Tuesday to press the urgency of a cease-fire deal between Hamas and Israel. Blinken has been working with Qatari and Egyptian officials to help negotiation efforts.
title: Blinken says Israel, Hamas cease-fire deal "has to get done"

description: Whether you're shooting still images or video, here are five waterproof and durable digital camera options.
title: The 6 best waterproof camera for vacations, vlogging and more

description: Sam's Club is ending some of its fees for curbside and delivery from club in August. Here's what you need to know.
title: Sam's Club Plus Members now get free delivery from club

description: United announced a special schedule that adds flights to the biggest college football matchups of the season.
title: United Airlines adds 20 flights for fans to attend college football games

description: Several high-profile individuals, including tech tycoon Mike Lynch, are missing after a yacht they were vacationing in sank off the southern coast of Italy. CBS News' Ian Lee has the latest.
title: Six missing after yacht sinks off Italy's coast

description: A new Pixel phone is coming, and you know what that means: Discounts on the older model.
title: Best clearance deals on the Google Pixel 8 following the Pixel 9 announcement

description: Gina McCarthy, the former U.S. Environmental Protection Agency administrator, says climate change and its economic impact could create hope among voters. McCarthy joins CBS News with more on the messaging about climate change and its link to the economy.
title: Former EPA administrator on climate change economic initiatives

description: Your laptop is a major investment - protect it with one of our best back-to-school laptop backpacks.
title: Best laptop backpacks for back to school

description: Wisconsin remains a critical battleground state for both Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump ahead of November. CBS News senior White House correspondent Weijia Jiang previews Harris' event in Milwaukee while the DNC continues in Chicago.
title: Harris, Walz headed to Wisconsin for rally at RNC site

description: Police divers have resumed searching for six people believed trapped in the hull of a superyacht that sank off Sicily.
title: Officials believe tornado sunk luxury yacht off coast of Sicily

description: Vice President Kamala Harris and Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz campaign in Milwaukee; Luxury yacht sinks off coast of Sicily.
title: 8/20: CBS News 24/7 Episode 2

description: The price of gold just climbed to yet another new high. Here's why you may want to buy in now.
title: Gold prices surge to a new record high: 4 benefits of buying in

description: "Those police officers responded perfectly, and we've got body cam footage to prove it," Chicago Police Supt. Larry Snelling said of the response to the breach.
title: Police arrested 13 people during first day of DNC; security fence fortified

description: Mortgage interest rates could soon drop significantly. Here are three mistakes homebuyers should avoid before then.
title: 3 mortgage mistakes to avoid before interest rates drop

description: The right prescription glasses stay in place and offer sharp vision -- no matter where you are or what sport you love.
title: Best prescription eyewear for athletes

description: U.S intelligence officials say Iran is behind an attack targeting former President Donald Trump's campaign for president. Officials also say Iran was also behind efforts to hack the then Biden-Harris campaign. CBS News intelligence and national security reporter Olivia Gazis reports.
title: U.S. publicly blames Iran for efforts to hack U.S. 2024 election campaigns

description: Make lab-quality prints at home from you digital images using one of these carefully curated photo printers.
title: The 7 best photo printers for creating pro-quality prints at home

description: Secretary of State Antony Blinken has been traveling around the Middle East as a push for a cease-fire deal for Hamas and Israel continues. Meanwhile, an Israeli strike at a Gaza school reportedly killed at least 10 people. CBS News' Ramy Inocencio has more.
title: Israel strikes Gaza school as Blinken travels for cease-fire deal with Hamas

description: Robert Telles, accused of murder in the death of Las Vegas journalist Jeff German, is expected to take the stand in his own defense as soon as Tuesday.
title: Watch Live: Robert Telles murder trial in death of Las Vegas journalist

description: Progressive Democrats Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez and Rep. Jasmine Crockett joined more traditional Democrats at the Democratic National Convention to show unity behind Vice President Kamala Harris' campaign. CBS News chief election and campaign correspondent Robert Costa has more.
title: Traditional, progressive Democrats join forces at DNC for Kamala Harris

description: These deals won't last long.
title: CBS Mornings Deals: Save up to 60% off household cleaning tools

description: Vice President Kamala Harris is headed to Wisconsin Tuesday as the Democratic National Convention enters its second day in Chicago. Wisconsin remains a key battleground state in the 2024 presidential election. CBS News campaign reporter Nidia Cavazos reports.
title: Why Kamala Harris is Leaving DNC in Chicago for Wisconsin

description: The second day of the Democratic National Convention in Chicago will include speeches by former President Barack Obama and former first lady Michelle Obama. CBS News Minnesota's Caroline Cummings looks ahead to Day 2 of programming at the DNC, and CBS News' Roxana Saberi has more on protests outside of the convention.
title: What's coming for Day 2 of DNC in Chicago

description: With a cut to interest rates looming for September, savers should determine the best CD to open right now.
title: Which is the best CD to open before the Fed cuts rates?

description: Israel says it recovered the bodies of six people taken hostage by Hamas on Oct. 7, 2023. This comes as cease-fire talks continue in the Middle East and the war rages on in the Gaza Strip. Wyre Davies with BBC News, a CBS News partner, has more.
title: Israel recovers bodies of six Hamas hostages

description: A commission found that the Army Reserves and local police missed chances to intervene and potentially stop the deadliest shootings in Maine history.
title: Army, police missed chances to potentially stop Maine shootings, report says

description: Mike Lynch, an icon of British entrepreneurship, is one of six people missing after his luxury yacht sank during a violent storm.
title: What to know about Mike Lynch, the tycoon missing from sunken yacht

description: Check yourself out in one of the best floor mirrors of 2024.
title: Best floor mirrors you can buy online

description: Secretary of Commerce Gina Raimondo is attending the Democratic National Convention in her capacity as former governor of Rhode Island and joins CBS News with more on the state of the economy and how Vice President Kamala Harris would take on rising costs.
title: Gina Raimondo on DNC, state of economy under Biden

description: A debt forgiveness program could dramatically reduce what you owe, but there are limits to this debt relief option.
title: How much of your credit card debt can be forgiven?

description: Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez of New York made her primetime Democratic National Convention debut.
title: Ocasio-Cortez urges Democrats to "choose a new path" in DNC speech

description: Schools in Methuen, Massachusetts, and other parts of the U.S. are banning the use of cellphones during class time. Eight states so far have passed laws or issued some sort of policy to curb phone use. Jessica Saum, an elementary school teacher and fellow at the Association of American Educators, joins CBS News with more.
title: Schools get tough on cellphone use in class

description: These robot vacuums from Lefant, Shark and more will keep your floors clean. But they won't break the bank.
title: The best budget robot vacuums under $250

description: The state of the U.S. in 1968 contributed to violent protests at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago. In 2024, the DNC is back in Illinois and Vice President Kamala Harris' week to accept the nomination appears different in some ways. Lindsay Chervinsky, a presidential historian, joins CBS News with more context on both Chicago conventions.
title: How Harris' DNC compares to 1968 Chicago convention

description: On the first day of the Democratic National Convention, Democrats from several factions of the party encouraged the crowd to rally around Vice President Kamala Harris as she prepares to accept the nomination to run against former President Donald Trump in November. Ashley Etienne, a CBS News political contributor and former communications director for Vice President Kamala Harris, joins CBS News with more on the DNC.
title: How Democrats united at DNC to thank Biden, endorse Harris

description: One of the former Minneapolis police officers convicted in the murder of George Floyd has been released from custody, according to the Federal Bureau of Prisons.
title: Former officer convicted in George Floyd murder released from prison

description: Rescue teams are searching for survivors after a luxury yacht was struck by a sudden storm off the coast of Sicily. The storm left at least one person dead and 15 others were rescued. Six people, including tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch, remain missing.
title: Rescue crews race to find survivors after luxury yacht sinks in Mediterranean

description: Phil Donahue, who revolutionized daytime television by inviting audience participation and tackling controversial subjects, died at 88 after a long illness. He left his influence on the industry with people like Oprah Winfrey crediting him for paving the way.
title: Remembering daytime TV legend Phil Donahue

description: President Joe Biden wrapped up the first day of the DNC with a speech reflecting on his long career and paving the way for Kamala Harris' official nomination. Harris, who got the biggest applause of the night, was endorsed by key Democratic figures, including Hillary Clinton and Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez.
title: Biden takes DNC stage to make case for Harris' presidency

description: President Biden passes the torch to Vice President Harris on an emotional day one of the Democratic National Convention. Also, former President Donald Trump gives CBS News an exclusive interview on the campaign trail. All that and all that matters in today's Eye Opener.
title: Eye Opener: Biden passes torch to VP Harris on first day of the Democratic National Convention

description: New York Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez addressed the Democratic National Convention in Chicago Monday during its first night. Ocasio-Cortez's speech made the argument for Vice President Kamala Harris, and called on voters to elect Democrats to Congress to work alongside Harris. CBS News senior White House and political correspondent Ed O'Keefe reports.
title: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez on Democrats in Congress during DNC address

description: President Biden says Hamas is "backing away" from a cease-fire proposal as Palestinian officials accuse Israel of bombing a school in Gaza.
title: Israel accused of deadly strike on Gaza school as truce talks continue

description: President Biden is vacationing this week in Santa Ynez, California. Presidential vacations can cause some headaches.
title: The president is coming to town for vacation. Get ready.

description: Democrats from across the country are returning for Day 2 of the Democratic National Convention as the party continues to rally around its new ticket.
title: DNC Day 2: Here's what to expect from the second day of the Democratic convention

description: Thousands marched in a show of solidarity with Palestine and calling for an end to U.S. funding to Israel.
title: Day 2 of DNC expected to bring more protests, demonstrations

description: Spain's Maria Branyas Morera, the world's oldest living person, who was born in the U.S. and lived through two world wars, the Spanish Civil War and the COVID pandemic, has died at 117, her family said Tuesday.
title: World's oldest person, U.S.-born Spanish woman, dies at 117, family says

description: Disney has now dropped its effort to get a wrongful death lawsuit dismissed over the fine print in its Disney+ streaming app. The company had previously said its terms include an arbitration clause.
title: Disney changes course on wrongful death lawsuit

description: The parents of Dimitrios Pagourtzis, a former student accused of killing 10 people at a high school near Houston in 2018, don't bear financial responsibility for the shooting, a jury decided.
title: Parents of accused gunman in deadly Texas school shooting found not liable

description: Medical aid in death is legal in 10 states and the District of Columbia. But only Oregon and Vermont explicitly allow out-of-state people who are terminally ill to die with assistance there.
title: Why Americans are traveling to Vermont and Oregon to die

description: President Biden closed out the opening night of the 2024 Democratic National Convention with a speech touting his Oval Office achievements, criticizing former President Donald Trump and throwing his support behind Vice President Kamala Harris. See Biden's full remarks.
title: Watch: President Biden delivers DNC address

description: "All this talk about how I'm angry at all those people (who) said I should step down — that's not true," President Biden said in his DNC speech Monday.
title: "I gave my best to you," Biden says at DNC, passing torch to Harris

description: Alabama's governor has set a Nov. 21 execution date for what is scheduled to be the nation's third death sentence carried out by nitrogen gas.
title: Alabama's third nitrogen execution set for November

description: First daughter Ashley Biden spoke lovingly about her father, President Biden, as she delivered remarks on the opening night of the Democratic National Convention. See her full address.
title: Watch: First daughter Ashely Biden speaks about father, President Biden, at DNC

description: First lady Jill Biden delivered heartfelt remarks about her husband, President Biden, while addressing the Democratic National Convention on Monday. See the first lady's full speech.
title: Watch: First lady Jill Biden pays tribute to President Biden in DNC address

description: Georgia Sen. Raphael Warnock called Donald Trump a plague on the American conscious while speaking about Jan. 6 on the opening night of the 2024 Democratic National Convention. See Warnock's full address.
title: Watch: Sen. Raphael Warnock discusses Jan. 6 in DNC remarks

description: Kentucky abortion access advocate Hadley Duvall and Kentucky Gov. Andy Beshear offered scathing criticisms of Donald Trump and the Republican Party on the issue of abortion rights while addressing the Democratic National Convention Monday night. See Duvall and Beshear's full remarks.
title: Hadley Duvall, Kentucky Gov. Andy Beshear hit Trump and GOP on abortion rights during DNC speeches

description: Texas Rep. Jasmine Crockett briefly choked up while giving an emotional address at the Democratic National Convention as she recounted meeting Vice President Kamala Harris for the first time. Crockett also compared the backgrounds of Harris and former President Donald Trump.
title: Watch: Rep. Jasmine Crockett gives emotional DNC speech, compares Trump and Harris' resumes

description: Hillary Clinton spoke at the first night of the Democratic National Convention.
title: Hillary Clinton says "the future is here, it's in our grasp," in energetic DNC speech

description: President Biden and former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton are addressing the convention on its first night.
title: Fact checking DNC 2024 Day 1 speeches by Biden, Hillary Clinton, other Democrats

description: Former Secretary of State and 2016 presidential contender Hillary Clinton addressed the Democratic National Convention Monday night, speaking in support of Vice President Kamala Harris against former President Donald Trump. See Clinton's full remarks.
title: Watch: Hillary Clinton delivers DNC address in support of Kamala Harris

description: New York Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez made her case for Vice President Kamala Harris' campaign at the Democratic National Convention on Monday. See Ocasio-Cortez's full remarks.
title: Watch: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez makes impassioned argument for Kamala Harris at DNC

description: Shawn Fain, president of the United Auto Workers union, addressed the Democratic National Convention Monday night, voicing his support for Vice President Kamala Harris' campaign and calling former President Donald Trump a scab. See Fain's full remarks.
title: Watch: UAW President Shawn Fain addresses DNC, calls Trump a scab

description: Golden State Warriors head coach Steve Kerr, fresh off leading the USA men's basketball team to gold at the Paris Olympics, voiced his support for Kamala Harris' campaign Monday night during the Democratic National Convention at Chicago's United Center, where Kerr played for three NBA champion Chicago Bulls teams.
title: Watch: NBA coach Steve Kerr addresses DNC at Chicago's United Center

description: Vice President Kamala Harris took the stage to raucous applause Monday during opening night of the Democratic National Convention thanking President Biden for his years of service and telling the crowd, "When we fight, we win."
title: Watch: Kamala Harris takes stage on opening night of DNC

description: Michigan state Sen. Mallory McMorrow took the stage on the first night of the Democratic National Convention to warn about Project 2025, the detailed blueprint for the next Republican president.
title: Michigan state senator warns about Project 2025 in DNC speech

description: DNC chair Jaime Harrison joined CBS News to discuss the excitement he says Democratic voters have for Vice President Kamala Harris, the differences between the 2024 and 2016 races and more.
title: DNC chair on enthusiasm for Kamala Harris

description: While a new generation of protestors is leading the demonstrations at the 2024 DNC, some who participated in the 1968 protests are returning.
title: A new generation of protestors takes on the 2024 DNC in Chicago

description: With the DNC back in Chicago, thousands are once again protesting. Mark Strassmann spoke with new organizers and those who took part in the infamous 1968 demonstrations about what they expect to see this year.
title: A new generation of protesters takes on DNC in Chicago

description: A new CBS News poll shows more Democrats say they will definitely vote after Kamala Harris took over for President Biden as the Democratic presidential nominee. CBS News elections and surveys executive director Anthony Salvanto has more on the state of the race.
title: Kamala Harris fueling Democratic enthusiasm, CBS News poll shows

description: Sen. Mark Kelly of Arizona joined CBS News from the Democratic National Convention in Chicago to discuss, among other subjects, the race between former President Donald Trump and Vice President Kamala Harris, maintaining a fair election and reaching across the aisle to Republicans.
title: Sen. Mark Kelly on Trump vs. Harris, election fairness, bipartisanship

description: Delaware State Sen. Sarah McBride discusses President Biden's legacy and the "pride and gratitude" Democrats have for him ahead of his keynote speech on the first night of the Democratic National Convention in Chicago.
title: Delaware state senator talks Biden's legacy, "pride and gratitude" for president

description: Day 1 of the Democratic National Convention will feature addresses from President Biden and 2016 Democratic presidential nominee Hillary Clinton. CBS News political director Fin Gómez has more on Clinton's speech and other notes about the convention, including how it differs from last month's Republican National Convention.
title: What to expect from Hillary Clinton's DNC speech

description: The 2024 Democratic National Convention in Chicago will be the first time the Windy City has hosted the convention since 1996. Adriana Diaz breaks down why Chicago was picked to host this year's DNC.
title: Why Chicago was selected to host DNC 2024

description: At least two people have died as a result of flash flooding that hit Connecticut and other parts of the Northeast. Parts of New Jersey and New York's Long Island were also hit hard. Nikki Battiste reports.
title: At least 2 killed as flash floods hit Northeast

description: Democratic Rep. Katherine Clark, the House minority whip, joined CBS News to discuss the Democratic National Convention, President Biden's decision to step aside and former President Donald Trump's continued attacks against Vice President Kamala Harris.
title: House Minority Whip Katherine Clark on Biden dropping out of race, Kamala Harris campaign

description: Six people, including two Americans, are missing after a yacht sank off the southern tip of Italy. At least one person has died.
title: 6 people, including 2 Americans, missing after yacht sinks off Italian coast

description: Ukrainian forces say they control an area of Russia larger than Los Angeles following a shocking incursion earlier this month. Ian Lee got an inside look at how Ukraine's troops were able to enter Russia.
title: An inside look at how Ukrainian forces invaded Russia

description: Former President Trump is campaigning in several battleground states as the Democratic National Convention is happening in Chicago. Caitlin Huey-Burns spoke with the former president, who defended his use of personal attacks against Vice President Kamala Harris. Then, Robert Costa helps dissect Trump's strategy.s
title: Trump defends personal attacks against Harris

description: Democratic strategist Chuck Rocha and Republican strategist Matt Gorman joined CBS News to discuss President Biden's night 1 address at the Democratic National Convention, former President Donald Trump's ongoing attacks against Vice President Kamala Harris and the current state of the 2024 presidential race.
title: GOP and Democratic strategists on Biden's DNC address, Trump's rhetoric

description: Rev. Jesse Jackson received a standing ovation when he appeared on stage in a wheelchair at the Democratic National Convention on Monday. The 82-year-old civil rights activist has been battling Parkinson's disease for years.
title: Jesse Jackson gets standing ovation at DNC
